text: Ramiro de León Carpio (January 12, 1942 - April 16, 2002) was a Guatemalan politician. He was the President of Guatemala from June 6, 1993 until January 14, 1996. De León died while in a diabetic coma at a Miami hospital on April 16, 2002 at the age of 60."Ramiro de Leon Carpio, 60; Former Guatemala Leader", Associated Press, April 17, 2002. title: Ramiro de León Carpio
